title: New: Døden – Afasi / Apraksi
content:
Norway is the most beautiful country in the world.

Well, certainly out of all places that I’ve been to, Norway is right up at at the top; from the rolling expanses of greenery, to the halcyon beaches, not to mention the wealth of attractive females. Norwegian outfit Døden encapsulate two of those traits, with their composed debut tracks Afasi and Apraksi. Now here’s where my rather limited knowledge of drone lets me down, but there’s hints of Aphex Twin’s Selected Ambient Works Volume II and of course, king of drone, Tim Hecker. Strap your headphones on, turn it up loud, and just listen.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
